title: SenservaPro (Preview)
descriptionMarkdown: The SenservaPro data connector provides a viewing experience for your SenservaPro scanning logs. View dashboards of your data, use queries to hunt & explore, and create custom alerts.

sampleQueries.description: All SenservaPro data received in the last 24 hours
All SenservaPro data with 'High' Severity, ordered by the most recent received
sampleQueries.query:
SenservaPro_CL
            | where Severity == 3
            | order by TimeGenerated desc

sampleQueries.description: All 'ApplicationNotUsingClientCredentials' controls received in the last 14 days
sampleQueries.query:
let timeframe = 14d;
            SenservaPro_CL
            | where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
            | where ControlName_s == 'ApplicationNotUsingClientCredentials'

dataTypes.name: SenservaPro_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
SenservaPro_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
SenservaPro_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.title: 1. Setup the data connection
instructionSteps.description: Visit [Senserva Setup](https://www.senserva.com/senserva-setup/) for information on setting up the Senserva data connection, support, or any other questions. The Senserva installation will configure a Log Analytics Workspace for output. Deploy Azure Sentinel onto the configured Log Analytics Workspace to finish the data connection setup by following [this onboarding guide.](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/quickstart-onboard)
